definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
to pour wine/to drink wine/to deliberate/to consider

sentences.english: He struggled to formulate an answer.
sentences.chinese: 他努力字斟句酌地回答。

sentences.english: But in the top job there simply isn't time to read every dot and comma before taking a decision.
sentences.chinese: 但身居高位，通常沒有時間在做出決定前字斟句酌。

sentences.english: His reply was given in measured phrases.
sentences.chinese: 他的回答是經過字斟句酌的。

sentences.english: Sir. basil was composing his last words.
sentences.chinese: 巴茲爾爵士字斟句酌地說出最後一句話。

sentences.english: Speak clearly if you speak along with hasl. Carve every word prior to let it fhasl.
sentences.chinese: 要說就乾脆說得一清二楚，說出前每句話要字斟句酌。

definition: literal/word by word and phrase by phrase
wording/way of expressing something/turn of phrase/diction
to consider/to deliberate/to fill up a cup to the brim
to bite words and chew characters (idiom); punctilious about minutiae of wording
wording/way of expressing something/turn of phrase/diction
lit. to quote the classics/to quote chapter and verse (idiom)
writing style (formal)/to send an official written communication
